GS41vivahapu:1: VP_1cd/.praṇamya devāya manobhavāya khalīkṛtaṃ yena jagat samagram//
GS41vivahapu:2: VP_2ab/.prajāpatir manmatha eva yasmāt kāmād vinā na prabhavaḥ prajānām/
GS41vivahapu:3: VP_2cd/.mahatsu sūkṣmeṣu ca so 'sti devaḥ sarvātmakaḥ sarvagataś ca
GS41vivahapu:5: VP_3ab/.yasmāt paran nāparam asti kiñcit saukṣmyān mahatvāc ca yataś ca
GS41vivahapu:7: VP_3cd/.tenedam ekena manobhavena vyāptaṃ jagac chāṛṅgabhṛteva sarvam//
GS41vivahapu:8: VP_4ab/.agamyagāmī bhagavān prajeśaḥ śroṇīsahasrāṅkatanuś ca śakraḥ/
GS41vivahapu:9: VP_4cd/.caturmukho yena kṛtaś ca śambhu samanmatho maṅgalam ādadhātu//
GS41vivahapu:10: VP_5ab/.bhagavān api śārṅgarathāṅgadharo bhagavat(t)vam avāpa yataḥ/
GS41vivahapu:11: VP_5cd/.bahavo 'sya bhagā iti tena kṛtaṃ bhagavān iti nāma jagat prathitam//
GS41vivahapu:12: VP_6ab/.sītāviyogena bahuni duḥkhāny āptāni rāmeṇa salakṣmaṇena/
GS41vivahapu:13: VP_6cd/.tānīha saṃsmṛtya kalau sahasrāṇy aṣṭau tathāṣṭau ca vivāhitāni//
GS41vivahapu:14: VP_7ab/.durbhagās tanayavarjitāś ca yā niḥsvasanti vanitāḥ pativratā/
GS41vivahapu:18: VP_8cd/.ubhayakulaviśuddhe jñātaśīle surūpe prathamavayasi dadyāt kanyakāṃ yauvanasthe//
GS41vivahapu:19: VP_9ab/.puṣye divase 'thavā kṣaṇe vaivāhyeṣu ca bheṣu kārayet/
GS41vivahapu:23: VP_10cd/.nadīṃ nayeyuḥ saro 'thavā taṭaṃ kanyām alaṅkṛtya sahendra
GS41vivahapu:25: VP_11ab/.sūrpeṇadikṣu pramadā baliṃ tā datvā sakālīyakagandhadigdhām/
GS41vivahapu:27: VP_12ab/.dadhyodanena haviṣā madhunā ca kanyā saṃpūjya śakradayitāṃ ca salohastā [U. salohahastā]/
GS41vivahapu:28: VP_12cd/.tūṣṇīṃ praṇamya śirasā gṛham eva yāyād devīṃ pragṛhya muditā niyataiś ca keśaiḥ//
GS41vivahapu:29: VP_13ab/.gṛhe stitāṃ [U. sthitāṃ] tāṃ puruhūtapatnīṃ prāṅmadhyāstamayeṣu
GS41vivahapu:31: VP_13cd/.sraggandhadhūpaiḥ pratipūjaṇec [U. pratipūjayec] ca pāṇīgrahaṃ yāvad upāgateti//
GS41vivahapu:33: VP_14b/.tāṃbūlaṃ pravarāmbarāṇi ruciraṃ gītaṃ vibhūtyaś cayā/
GS41vivahapu:34: VP_14c/.yasmān na striyam antareṇa hi nṛṇāṃ sarvāṇy abhiprītaye
GS41vivahapu:36: VP_14e/.uktaṃ janmani yat tad eva bhavitā yady aṅganānāṃ phalam/
GS41vivahapu:37: VP_14f/.vyartho na tv ayam ādaraṃ pariṇaye tatkālalagnādigaḥ//
GS41vivahapu:38: VP_15ab/.ajñātaṃ prathamaṃ pradhānam aparaṃ tadvyañjakaṃ yoṣitām/
GS41vivahapu:39: VP_15cd/.udvāhe niyati nayaty atibalād velāsamāyuk phalaiḥ//
GS41vivahapu:40: VP_16a/.vātsyo varṣam anojam icchati tathā ebhyo janaś cottaraṃ
GS41vivahapu:41: VP_16b/.strīṇāṃ mānam [U. nāmam] ṛtuṃ vihāya munayo māṇḍavyaśiṣyā jaguḥ/
GS41vivahapu:42: VP_16c/.caitraṃ projjhya parāśāro kathayate durbhāgyadaṃ yoṣitāṃ
GS41vivahapu:43: VP_16d/.āṣāḍhādicatuṣṭayena śubhadaṃ kaiś cit pradiṣṭaṃ dvijaiḥ//
GS41vivahapu:44: VP_17ab/.śreṣṭhaṃ pakṣam uṣanti śuklam asitasyādyaṃ tribhāgaṃ tathā/
GS41vivahapu:45: VP_17cd/.riktāṃ projjhya tithiṃ tathā tv ayanayoḥ sandhiṃ ca śeṣāḥ śubhāḥ//
GS41vivahapu:48: VP_18cd/.kaiścit stharyam uṣanti sauradivase cāndre samāpatnikam//
GS41vivahapu:50: VP_19cd/.bahusutaśukha [U. sukha]dāsīvittasaubhāgyayuktā janayati paritoṣaṃ kanyakā bāndhavānām//
GS41vivahapu:53: VP_21ab/.prītir janmasu tārakāsu parataḥ sañjñānurūpaṃ phalam/
GS41vivahapu:55: VP_22ab/.nakṣatratulyaṃ phalam āha gargaḥ kṣeṇeṣu nakṣatrapasañjñiteṣu
GS41vivahapu:56: VP_22cd/.hārītababhrū dvijadevalaś ca viṣṭi vinā 'nyat karaṇaṃ praśastam//
GS41vivahapu:58: VP_23cd/.tithir iti balabān vadanti gargāḥ karaṇabalād divaso 'pi bhāguriś
GS41vivahapu:60: VP_23ef/.dinakaraṇabalād bhṛgur bhavīryaṃ balam udayasya jagāda jīvaśarmā//
GS41vivahapu:72: VP_27a/.dāridrayaṃ [U. dāridryaṃ] raviṇā kujena maraṇaṃ saumyena nasyuḥ prajāḥ
GS41vivahapu:73: VP_27b/.daurbhāgyaṃ guruṇā sitena sahite candreṇa sāpatnikā/
GS41vivahapu:75: VP_27d/.vyādhyair mṛtyur aṇaṃgrahair [U. asaṅgrahair] bahuvidhā dīkṣā pravāsāḥ śubhaiḥ//
GS41vivahapu:76: VP_28ab/.kriye kumāreṣv anuraktacittā vihīnavittā gavi govratā ca/
GS41vivahapu:78: VP_29ab/.harau prasūtā sakṛd āśritā pituḥ patipriyā 'ti śvaśurasya
GS41vivahapu:80: VP_29cd/.tulādimānārthavatī tulādhare tathālini krandati nityam asthirā//
GS41vivahapu:81: VP_30ab/.dhanuṣi kulaṭā tatpūrvārddhe satīty apare jaguḥ/
GS41vivahapu:84: VP_31cd/.dvipadabhavaneṣv apy anyāṃśā na bhavanti śubhāvahā//
GS41vivahapu:85: VP_32ab/.bhānur mṛtyur na bahudhanatāṃ bhartṛdāyād avittaṃ [U. vittaṃ]
GS41vivahapu:87: VP_32cd/.vaidhavyaṃ syān [U. prāk] na laghumaraṇaṃ dharmahāniṃ viśīlaṃ lābhānekān vyayam api dadāty udgamarkṣāt krameṇa//
GS41vivahapu:88: VP_33ab/.śaśiny aśvā sārthā tad anu śubhatā bāndhavahitā viputrā bandhyārtā bhavati sasapatnā [U. sapatnā] ''śunidhanā/
GS41vivahapu:89: VP_33cd/.janitrī kanyānām atha vihatakarmā 'tidhaninī vyayāśaktety eke jagur aśubhadā bandhuṣu
GS41vivahapu:90: VP_34ab/.mṛtyur naiḥsvaṃ sārthatā bandhuvairaṃ na syuḥ putrā bhartṛvṛddhiṃ
GS41vivahapu:92: VP_34cd/.raktasrāvo nānukulye ca bhartuḥ kravyācchailyaṃ svāptināśaṃ ca
GS41vivahapu:96: VP_35cd/.bandhyā vyasur niyamadānakṛśāṅgavittā māyāvatī dhanavatī vyayanīya [U. vyayanī] saumye//
GS41vivahapu:97: VP_36ab/.patyuḥ priyā 'ti dhaninī muditā dhanyāḍhyā putrānvitā hataparā na
GS41vivahapu:99: VP_36cd/.kṣīṇāyuṣā śubharatā śubhasiddhakāryā svāyānvitā tadubhayopakṛtā ca jīve//
GS41vivahapu:101: VP_37b/.suputrā vairāḍhyā tad anu kulaṭā kṣipranidhanā/
GS41vivahapu:107: VP_38d/.pānair arthān nayati vilayaṃ prāvilagnāt krameṇa//
GS41vivahapu:108: VP_39ab/.saumyā vyayāstanidhanaṃ tryaribhaṃ ca śukre [U. śukraḥ] hitvā sthitas tridhanalābhagataḥ
GS41vivahapu:109: VP_39cd/.pāpā triṣaḍnidhanalābhagatā vivāhe hitvā 'ṣṭamaṃ kṣitijam iṣṭaphalāni dadyuḥ//
GS41vivahapu:111: VP_40cd/.yad aśubham upayāti tac chubhatvaṃ śubham api vṛddhim upaiti tatprabhāvāt//
GS41vivahapu:118: VP_44ab/.vilagnāṃśaḥ svanāthena yady udvāhe na dṛśyate/
GS41vivahapu:119: VP_44cd/.puṃvināśas tato 'stāṃśe yady evaṃ yoṣitas tathā//
GS41vivahapu:120: VP_45ab/.gurusitayor uccagayor ekatame vā vilagnage kanyā/
GS41vivahapu:121: VP_45cd/.rājñi bhavaty asaṃśayam eva gurusaumyayoś coḍhā//
GS41vivahapu:124: VP_47ab/.carabhavanagataṃ vihāya satyaḥ śaśinam uvāca śubhapradaṃ vivāhe/
GS41vivahapu:125: VP_47cd/.munivacanavirodhi tac ca sūtre na tu kathite
GS41vivahapu:128: VP_48cd/.nāmāni cakre grahayogalagne śrīdevakīrtiḥ śṛṇu tasya ca ''ryā//
GS41vivahapu:129: VP_49ab/.nando bhadro jīvo jīmūtaḥ sthāvaro jayo vijayaḥ/
GS41vivahapu:131: VP_50ab/.saumye vilagne nandaḥ śukre bhadras tathā gurau jīvaḥ/
GS41vivahapu:133: VP_51ab/.saumyair atha tair vā ravibhaumaśanaiścaraiḥ kramaśaḥ/
GS41vivahapu:134: VP_51cd/.saumyaiḥ jñeyā saumyā krūrāḥ kruraiḥ [U. krūraiḥ] samākhyātā//
GS41vivahapu:135: VP_52ab/.dinakarayogād vyālo bhaumena rasātalaḥ kṣayaḥ śaninā/
GS41vivahapu:136: VP_52cd/.tamasā tamo nirukto 'thāntye keto [U. ketor] kṛtāntaś ca//
GS41vivahapu:137: VP_53ab/.triṣu nandādiṣu rājñī caturṣu cātaḥ paraṃ mahādevī/
GS41vivahapu:138: VP_53cd/.vyālādyeṣu ca pañcaṣu vidhavāḥ śocyā daridrāś ca//
GS41vivahapu:139: VP_54ab/.anadhikṛtaḥ śubhakṛt syād ete [U. etaiś] candro 'nyathā
GS41vivahapu:141: VP_54cd/.tasmāt vivāhasamaye na kena cit saṅgataḥ śaśī dhanyaḥ//
GS41vivahapu:142: VP_55ab/.sapta te śaśiyogā saumyā [U. saumyaiḥ] saha
GS41vivahapu:144: VP_55cd/.aśubhaphaladās tu pāpaiḥ patyudvahane vivarjyās te//
GS41vivahapu:145: VP_55ef/.tasmād etān yogān matimāṃ[sic.] sañcivtya [U. yuñjīta]
GS41vivahapu:147: VP_56ab/.ūḍhā nande kanyā devīśabdaṃ samāpnuyād acirāt//
GS41vivahapu:148: VP_56cd/.bhavati narendrajananī bhartuḥ prāṇaiḥ priyā caiva/
GS41vivahapu:149: VP_57ab/.bhadre pāṇigrahaṇe yadi nāma kumārikā samupayāti//
GS41vivahapu:150: VP_57cd/.sā tvaritān nṛpaśabdaṃ karoti bhārtuḥ kulasyāpi/
GS41vivahapu:151: VP_58ab/.pariṇītā jīvākhye kanyā vijayāya kīrtyate bhartuḥ//
GS41vivahapu:152: VP_58cd/.prāpnoti sā trivargaṃ kuladvayaṃ cāpi nandayati/
GS41vivahapu:153: VP_59ab/.jīmūte pariṇītā vipulān bhogān mahāphalān bhuktvā//
GS41vivahapu:155: VP_60ab/.sthāvarayoge kanyā pāṇigraham etya vipulam aiśvaryam//
GS41vivahapu:157: VP_61ab/.pāṇigraham etya jaye jaghanyakulajāpi bhartur aiśvaryam//
GS41vivahapu:159: VP_62ab/.vijayāṃ prāpyodvāhaṃ prāpnoti sutān yaśo 'rthalābhaṃ ca//
GS41vivahapu:160: VP_62cd/.vaṃśasya ca pratiṣṭhāṃ parato maraṇāc ca suralokam/
GS41vivahapu:161: VP_63ab/.vyāle vyālākārā pāṇigraham eti kanyakā daivāt//
GS41vivahapu:163: VP_64ab/.pātālanāmani gatā pāṇigrahaṇe ca pañcamān māsāt//
GS41vivahapu:164: VP_64cd/.sā prāpya doṣam atulaṃ paraḥ prāṇān parityajati/
GS41vivahapu:165: VP_65ab/.kṣayam āsādyodvāhaṃ kanyā pakṣadvayāt patiṃ hatvā//
GS41vivahapu:166: VP_65cd/.nīcena tu saha bhartrā kṣapayati jārāgninā gotram/
GS41vivahapu:168: VP_66cd/.saptati rātrāt kṣapayati yady api jātā surendreṇa/
GS41vivahapu:169: VP_67ab/.yadi khalu kṛtāntayoge pariṇayam āyati kanyakā daivāt//
GS41vivahapu:172: VP_68cd/.ebhyaḥ śubham aśubhaṃ vā nirdeśyā janmalagnābhyām/
GS41vivahapu:173: VP_69ab/.ātmeti janmalagnaṃ pañcama navamaṃ ca kīrtitaṃ tasmāt//
GS41vivahapu:175: VP_70ab/.duścikyaṃ jāmitraṃ caikādaśakaṃ ca poṣakaṃ jñeyam//
GS41vivahapu:177: VP_71ab/.hitvā śaśāṅkaṃ yadi sapta saumyaiḥ pañcāśubhaiḥ kiṃ kathitā na saptā//
GS41vivahapu:178: VP_71cd/.dvitryādiyogān parihṛtya kasmān noktaṃ śataṃ trighanaṃ vilagne/
GS41vivahapu:179: VP_72ab/.deśācāras tāvad ādau vicintyo deśe deśe yā sthiti saiva kāryā//
GS41vivahapu:180: VP_72cd/.lokadviṣṭāṃ paṇḍitā varjayanti daivajño 'pi lokamārgeṇa yāyāt/
GS41vivahapu:181: VP_73ab/.bṛhaspatau gocaraśobhanasthe vivāham icchanti ca dakṣiṇātyāḥ/
GS41vivahapu:182: VP_73cd/.ravau śubhasthe ca vadanti gauḍā na gocaro mālavake pramāṇam//
GS41vivahapu:183: VP_74ab/.harau prasupte na ca dakṣiṇāyane na caitramāse na ca puṣyasaṃjñite/
GS41vivahapu:184: VP_74cd/.tithau ca rikte śaśini kṣayaṅgate ravīndubhaumārkidineṣu cāśubham//
GS41vivahapu:185: VP_75ab/.vyatipātahataṃ dinatrayaṃ vyatipātena samaṃ ca vaidhṛtim//
GS41vivahapu:186: VP_75cd/.tad api sphuṭapātadarśane dviguṇaṃ yadi vā na niścitam/
GS41vivahapu:187: VP_76ab/.vyatipātavyāghātaḥ ṣaṣṭhe daśame ca vaidhṛtaṃ dhiṣṇye//
GS41vivahapu:189: VP_77ab/.tad idaṃ vyatipātaṃ ca kathayanti uttaradiksthitājanāḥ//
GS41vivahapu:192: VP_78cd/.khaśeṣu hūṇeṣu na bāhlikeṣu vā na, kāṇadeśeṣu na gopabhojāḥ/
GS41vivahapu:193: VP_79ab/.ekādaśoktāni śubhāni bhāni śeṣāṇy aniṣṭāni vivāhakāle//
GS41vivahapu:194: VP_79cd/.tatrāgni [U. tatrāpi] tārā śaśivīryayuktā triṃśan muhūrtāś ca vicintanīyāḥ/
GS41vivahapu:195: VP_80ab/.tulādharastrīmithunād vivāha [U. vihāya] lagne sthitā pāpaphalā
GS41vivahapu:198: VP_81ab/.māse nāṣṭāu viṣṭiduṣṭāni bhāni tatrāpy eke rātrim āhur dinaṃ ca//
GS41vivahapu:199: VP_81cd/.tithyarddhe 'ntye prāptināśau ca viṣṭe [U. viṣṭeḥ] cāndraṃ mānaṃ viṣṭihetu na
GS41vivahapu:200: VP_82ab/.prācyāḥ prāyoḥ nyūnavarṇāḥ sagopāḥ saṃdhyākālaṃ prāhur iṣṭaṃ na
GS41vivahapu:202: VP_82cd/.yāvac chāntaṃ gorajo nābhyupeti tāvat teṣāṃ cittaśuddhir vivāhe/
GS41vivahapu:203: VP_83a/.gopair yaṣṭayāhatānāṃ [U. yaṣṭyāhatānāṃ] khurapuṭadalitā yā tu
GS41vivahapu:206: VP_83c/.tasmin kāle na ca rkṣaṃ na ca tithikaraṇaṃ naiva lagnaṃ na yogaḥ
GS41vivahapu:207: VP_83d/.khyātaḥ puṃsāṃ sukhārthaṃ śamayati duritāni utthitaṃ gorajas tu/
GS41vivahapu:208: VP_84ab/.kulasya deśasya ca cittavṛttir na khaṇḍaniyā [U. khaṇḍanīyā]
GS41vivahapu:210: VP_84cd/.dosaḥ pratisyāyakṛto 'pi yo 'tra saṃbhāvyate jyautiṣikasya so
GS41vivahapu:212: VP_85ab/.śāstraśarīram abudhvā bahudhā jalpanti yady api nānumatam//
GS41vivahapu:214: VP_86ab/.evaṃ vivāhasamaye gamane praveśe kāryeṣu maṅgalayuteṣv athavā
GS41vivahapu:216: VP_86cd/.doṣaṃ kuśikṣitakudaivavido vadanti rāgeṇa vā paṭudhiyo namo 'stu
GS41vivahapu:218: VP_87ab/.gocaraśuddhāv induṃ kanyāyā yatnataḥ śubhaṃ vīkṣya//
GS41vivahapu:219: VP_87cd/.tigmakiraṇaś ca puṃsaḥ śeṣair avarṇair api vivāhaḥ/
GS41vivahapu:220: VP_88ab/.na sakalaguṇasaṃpal labhyate 'lpair ahobhir bahutaraguṇayogaṃ yojayet maṅgaleṣu//
GS41vivahapu:221: VP_88cd/.prabhavati na hi doṣo bhūribhāve guṇānāṃ salilalava ivāgneḥ
GS41vivahapu:223: VP_89ab/.guṇaśatam api doṣaḥ kaścid eko 'pi vṛddhaḥ kṣapayati yadi nānyat tadvirodhiguṇo 'sti/
GS41vivahapu:224: VP_89cd/.ghaṭam api paripūrṇaṃ pañcagavyasya śaktyā malinayati surāyā
GS41vivahapu:227: VP_90cd/.jvalitāgnisamakṣamaṅgalaṃ yad avāpnoti śubhāśubhaṃ ca tam//
GS41vivahapu:228: VP_91ab/.cakre varāhamihiraḥ praṇipatya sādhūn samyak vivāhapaṭalaṃ pṛthutāṃ vihāya/
GS41vivahapu:229: VP_91cd/.pūrvaṃ ca yad yuvatijanmavidhau mayoktaṃ saṃcintya tac ca
